title: What to do when you get in a game and someone is trying to derank themselves?
body: Was just in a pre-game lobby, luckily someone dodged, but a player said that he was going to troll because he wanted to derank himself. What can you honestly do besides have someone dodge that game? I know that I could play through it and report him after but i shouldn't have to deal with players doing this.

replies.body:
-3LP for dodging or -20LP because of troll throwing game?

Such a difficult decision :/

My last ranked game I had somebody say they'd feed because the first pick couldn't secure him Jayce (apparently the 1st pick didn't even have Jayce). I thought he was bluffing to make somebody dodge but it wasn't, and to top it off he was in a 3 premade and they all fed and trolled along. I'll never take that chance again unless it's a promo series or something, I'll dodge and not even look back.
